title: 1.7.10 papi变量拓展Statistic问题
author: AttraCtionFox
txt_content: Statistic是无法使用么 用里面的变量都会报错 写在BossShopPro菜单上就不能打开菜单了

replies.txt_content: Papi你用的那个版本？尽量用比较旧的

replies.author: HK_Wallace
replies.txt_content:
BossShopPro变量不能用作物品數量或物品物料類型 你確定用對嗎?

https://www.spigotmc.org/wiki/bossshoppro-placeholders/

replies.author: HK_Wallace
replies.txt_content:
HK_Wallace 发表于 2020-8-13 00:55
BossShopPro变量不能用作物品數量或物品物料類型 你確定用對嗎?

https://www.spigotmc.org/wiki/bossshopp ...
Statistic 可用变量
就得要打/papi ecloud download Statistic 再打/papi reload

%statistic_use_item:<Item Material>%
%statistic_break_item:<Item Material>%
